review_data.title: The Lemongrass ist nicht nur Thai essen
review_data.content: einer der Beste Thailändische essen in Zürich. Authentisch Thai ist nur The Lemongrass. Ich gehe sonnt keine anderen Ort

review_data.title: Good Thai Take-Away
review_data.content: The lemon grass is mainly a take away, but there are also a few seats. They serve honest Thai food at a reasonable price. I had them catering for a party which was both excellent in service and food quality.

review_data.title: cheap food, rather unfriendly staff
review_data.content: the food is not too expensive (CHF 13.5 for take away), but don't expect too much. one usually gets a lot of rice and then some meat or vegetables.

review_data.title: Good flavor but not so good quality
review_data.content: I enjoy the taste very much, but as typical fast food, the meat especially sea food are often not fresh (frozen of course) and once even had gone bad with shrimps... Pity

review_data.title: OK
review_data.content: An OK place. Not too good, not too bad. Pop in if you are passing but not worth a trip especially for it

review_data.title: Solid, cheap Thai take-away and lunch restaurant
review_data.content: Don't expect too much from this Thai restaurant. It basically just serves a couple of good standard Thai dishes for lunch one can choose from. The meals are of good quality and home-style cooking though, and of great value, if you consider the low price...More

review_data.title: Very good food and very friendly service

review_data.title: Jedsada

review_data.title: OK for a take away with seating possibility

review_data.title: A bad experience

review_data.title: Very good...
